positive_examples: This is an example of electronic warfare operation.
The electronic warfare operation demonstrated clear characteristics.
We observed electronic warfare operation in this context.
A typical case of electronic warfare operation would involve these features.
The concept of electronic warfare operation applies here.
Military information operations involving the use of electromagnetic spectrum to attack enemy systems or protect friendly forces.
negative_examples: This is an example of defensive information operation, not electronic warfare operation.
This represents information operation in general.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: DefensiveInformationOperation, or other types of InformationOperation

definition: Military operations using electromagnetic spectrum to attack or defend against adversaries.
